00011 #ifndef TYPET_HPP

00017 // define IsFundaT<>
00018 /**********************************
00019  * type1.hpp:
00020  **********************************/
00021 // primary template: in general T is no fundamental type
00022 template <typename T>
00023 class IsFundaT {
00024   public:
00025     enum { Yes = 0, No = 1};
00026 };
00027 
00028 // macro to specialize for fundamental types
00029 #define MK_FUNDA_TYPE(T)               \
00030     template<> class IsFundaT<T> {     \
00031       public:                          \
00032         enum { Yes = 1, No = 0 };      \
00033     };
00034 
00035 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(void)
00036 
00037 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(bool)
00038 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(char)
00039 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(signed char)
00040 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(unsigned char)
00041 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(wchar_t)
00042 
00043 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(signed short)
00044 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(unsigned short)
00045 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(signed int)
00046 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(unsigned int)
00047 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(signed long)
00048 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(unsigned long)
00049 #if LONGLONG_EXISTS
00050   MK_FUNDA_TYPE(signed long long)
00051   MK_FUNDA_TYPE(unsigned long long)
00052 #endif  // LONGLONG_EXISTS
00053 
00054 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(float)
00055 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(double)
00056 MK_FUNDA_TYPE(long double)
00057 
00058 #undef MK_FUNDA_TYPE
00059 /**** end of type1.hpp ****/
00060 
00061 // define primary template CompoundT<> (first version)
00062 //#include "type2.hpp"
00063 
00064 // define primary template CompoundT<> (second version)
00065 /**********************************
00066  * type6.hpp:
00067  **********************************/
00068 template<typename T>
00069 class IsFunctionT {
00070   private:
00071     typedef char One;
00072     typedef struct { char a[2]; } Two;
00073     template<typename U> static One test(...);
00074     template<typename U> static Two test(U (*)[1]);
00075   public:
00076     enum { Yes = sizeof(/*IsFunctionT<T>::*/test<T>(1)) == 1 };
00077     enum { No = !Yes };
00078 };
00079 
00080 template<typename T>
00081 class IsFunctionT<T&> {
00082   public:
00083     enum { Yes = 0 };
00084     enum { No = !Yes };
00085 };
00086 
00087 template<>
00088 class IsFunctionT<void> {
00089   public:
00090     enum { Yes = 0 };
00091     enum { No = !Yes };
00092 };
00093 
00094 template<>
00095 class IsFunctionT<void const> {
00096   public:
00097     enum { Yes = 0 };
00098     enum { No = !Yes };
00099 };
00100 
00101 // same for void volatile and void const volatile
00102 //...
00103 
00104 template<typename T>
00105 class CompoundT {           // primary template
00106   public:
00107     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 0,
00108            IsFuncT = IsFunctionT<T>::Yes,
00109            IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00110     typedef T BaseT;
00111     typedef T BottomT;
00112     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00113 };
00114 /**** end of type6.hpp ****/
00115 
00116 // define CompoundT<> specializations
00117 /**********************************
00118  * type3.hpp:
00119  **********************************/
00120 template<typename T>
00121 class CompoundT<T&> {       // partial specialization for references
00122   public:
00123     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 1, IsArrayT = 0,
00124            IsFuncT = 0, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00125     typedef T BaseT;
00126     typedef typename CompoundT<T>::BottomT BottomT;
00127     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00128 };
00129 
00130 template<typename T>
00131 class CompoundT<T*> {       // partial specialization for pointers
00132   public:
00133     enum { IsPtrT = 1, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 0,
00134            IsFuncT = 0, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00135     typedef T BaseT;
00136     typedef typename CompoundT<T>::BottomT BottomT;
00137     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00138 };
00139 /**** end of type3.hpp ****/
00140 /**********************************
00141  * type4.hpp:
00142  **********************************/
00143 #include <stddef.h>
00144 
00145 template<typename T, size_t N>
00146 class CompoundT <T[N]> {    // partial specialization for arrays
00147   public:
00148     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 1,
00149            IsFuncT = 0, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00150     typedef T BaseT;
00151     typedef typename CompoundT<T>::BottomT BottomT;
00152     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00153 };
00154 
00155 template<typename T>
00156 class CompoundT <T[]> {    // partial specialization for empty arrays
00157   public:
00158     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 1,
00159            IsFuncT = 0, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00160     typedef T BaseT;
00161     typedef typename CompoundT<T>::BottomT BottomT;
00162     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00163 };
00164 
00165 template<typename T, typename C>
00166 class CompoundT <T C::*> {  // partial specialization for pointer-to-members
00167   public:
00168     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 0,
00169            IsFuncT = 0, IsPtrMemT = 1 };
00170     typedef T BaseT;
00171     typedef typename CompoundT<T>::BottomT BottomT;
00172     typedef C ClassT;
00173 };
00174 /**** end of type4.hpp ****/
00175 /**********************************
00176  * type5.hpp:
00177  **********************************/
00178 template<typename R>
00179 class CompoundT<R()> {
00180   public:
00181     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 0,
00182            IsFuncT = 1, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00183     typedef R BaseT();
00184     typedef R BottomT();
00185     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00186 };
00187 
00188 template<typename R, typename P1>
00189 class CompoundT<R(P1)> {
00190   public:
00191     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 0,
00192            IsFuncT = 1, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00193     typedef R BaseT(P1);
00194     typedef R BottomT(P1);
00195     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00196 };
00197 
00198 template<typename R, typename P1>
00199 class CompoundT<R(P1, ...)> {
00200   public:
00201     enum { IsPtrT = 0, IsRefT = 0, IsArrayT = 0,
00202            IsFuncT = 1, IsPtrMemT = 0 };
00203     typedef R BaseT(P1);
00204     typedef R BottomT(P1);
00205     typedef CompoundT<void> ClassT;
00206 };
00207 //...
00208 /**** end of type5.hpp ****/

00210 // define IsEnumT<>
00211 /**********************************
00212  * type7.hpp:
00213  **********************************/
00214 struct SizeOverOne { char c[2]; };
00215 
00216 template<typename T,
00217          bool convert_possible = !CompoundT<T>::IsFuncT &&
00218                                  !CompoundT<T>::IsArrayT>
00219 class ConsumeUDC {
00220   public:
00221     operator T() const;
00222 };
00223 
00224 // conversion to function and array types is not possible
00225 template <typename T>
00226 class ConsumeUDC<T, false> {
00227 };
00228 
00229 // conversion to void type is not possible
00230 template <bool convert_possible>
00231 class ConsumeUDC<void, convert_possible> {
00232 };
00233 
00234 char enum_check(bool);
00235 char enum_check(char);
00236 char enum_check(signed char);
00237 char enum_check(unsigned char);
00238 char enum_check(wchar_t);
00239 
00240 char enum_check(signed short);
00241 char enum_check(unsigned short);
00242 char enum_check(signed int);
00243 char enum_check(unsigned int);
00244 char enum_check(signed long);
00245 char enum_check(unsigned long);
00246 #if LONGLONG_EXISTS
00247   char enum_check(signed long long);
00248   char enum_check(unsigned long long);
00249 #endif  // LONGLONG_EXISTS
00250 
00251 // avoid accidental conversions from float to int
00252 char enum_check(float);
00253 char enum_check(double);
00254 char enum_check(long double);
00255 
00256 SizeOverOne enum_check(...);    // catch all
00257 
00258 template<typename T>
00259 class IsEnumT {
00260   public:
00261     enum { Yes = IsFundaT<T>::No &&
00262                  !CompoundT<T>::IsRefT &&
00263                  !CompoundT<T>::IsPtrT &&
00264                  !CompoundT<T>::IsPtrMemT &&
00265                  sizeof(enum_check(ConsumeUDC<T>()))==1 };
00266     enum { No = !Yes };
00267 };
00268 /**** end of type7.hpp ****/
00269 
00270 // define IsClassT<>
00271 /**********************************
00272  * type8.hpp:
00273  **********************************/
00274 template<typename T>
00275 class IsClassT {
00276   public:
00277     enum { Yes = IsFundaT<T>::No &&
00278                  IsEnumT<T>::No &&
00279                  !CompoundT<T>::IsPtrT &&
00280                  !CompoundT<T>::IsRefT &&
00281                  !CompoundT<T>::IsArrayT &&
00282                  !CompoundT<T>::IsPtrMemT &&
00283                  !CompoundT<T>::IsFuncT };
00284     enum { No = !Yes };
00285 };
00286 /**** end of type8.hpp ****/
00287 
00288 // define template that handles all in one style
00289 template <typename T>
00290 class TypeT {
00291   public:
00292     enum { IsFundaT  = IsFundaT<T>::Yes,
00293            IsPtrT    = CompoundT<T>::IsPtrT,
00294            IsRefT    = CompoundT<T>::IsRefT,
00295            IsArrayT  = CompoundT<T>::IsArrayT,
00296            IsFuncT   = CompoundT<T>::IsFuncT,
00297            IsPtrMemT = CompoundT<T>::IsPtrMemT,
00298            IsEnumT   = IsEnumT<T>::Yes,
00299            IsClassT  = IsClassT<T>::Yes };
00300 };
00301 
00302 }
00303 }
00304 
00305 #endif // TYPET_HPP
